ygData.subject: Re: On the topic of petitions (long, but an important read)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You forgot one: They need to fix the Selo s/SOW conflict.  Either the program should recognize that multiple effects are in place and use the strongest
ygData.messageBody:
Greg Gillan wrote:
>
> From: Greg Gillan <GGillan@...>
>
> ... Here's what I propose: Let's put together a small list of our biggest
> complaints over the next couple of days. ...

You forgot one:

They need to fix the Selo's/SOW conflict. Either the program should
recognize that multiple effects are in place and use the strongest active
effect at a given time (which would be my vastly preferred solution,
although it may be too tough to code), or we must be permitted to cancel
SOW.
